attributes.action: make all GP's do at least one night per a month on call for their local area
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently Family Doctors can sign up not to do nights on call for their local area. I think this should be changed because we are having to contract our out of hours service out to European Doctors who may have trouble being understood and cost the NHS more money for the same amount of work.
